column4: Hi, i am trying the livecd. i can boot kubuntu 6.06 but have the wireless is not come up (only bluetooth) - while trying Fiesty 7.04 it fails during boot  "can't access tty; job control turned off"
for being in the safe side i have added a usb (TRENDnet) and PCMCIA (BELKIN) so i am shooting all over
